request.description:
### Toggle Itinerary Active Status

This endpoint sends an HTTP PUT request to toggle the active status of a specific itinerary.

#### Request

The request body should include the following parameters:

- `itineraryId` (string, required): The ID of the itinerary to be toggled.
    

#### Response

The response will be a JSON object following the schema below:

``` json
{
  "status": "string",
  "message": "string"
}

 ```

- `status` (string): Indicates the status of the request.
    
- `message` (string): Provides additional information about the request status.

item.name: Return isSaved for user for itinerary

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Skydiving Adventure",                 // Activity name
  "isOpen": true,                                // Whether the activity is open or not
  "advertiser": "SkyHigh Adventures",            // The name of the advertiser
  "date": "2024-12-15T10:00:00Z",                // The date and time of the activity (ISO format)
  "location": "New York, USA",                   // The location of the activity
  "price": 199.99,                               // The price for the activity
  "category": "Dining",                       // The category of the activity (must exist in the Category collection)
  "tags": ["Pool"],   // Tags associated with the activity (tags must exist in the Tags collection)
  "specialDiscount": 10,                         // Special discount (in percentage)
  "duration": 2                                   // Duration of the activity (in hours)
}
